name: Picture of You
description:
A woman finds herself inside a painting gifted to her by an acquaintance of the past.

✿ About 

A very short visual novel made in one week for the Only One of Any Asset jam using 1000 words, 1 sprite, 1 background, 1 BGM. Also my first attempt at Live2D, although implementation couldn't meet the jam deadline (currently not available).

The web version does not use Live2D due to lack of engine support.

If you enjoy this tiny game, you can follow me on Twitter for updates on my next free VN. Also don't forget to check out the co-writer, Windchimes' games, they're great.

✿ Credits 

Concept, character art & animation, design: rito @ Atelier Apricot
Co-writer: Windchimes
Coding: Pisoos

Royalty-free assets by Purple Planet Music (BGM), Rozum, ismode, StarLine Art (images)
